title: Keeping of a register of members by certain public companies.
content: 117A. (1) In case of any public company the shares or other securities or transferrable securities of which are listed in a foreign market, such company shall be considered as complying with the provisions of this Law in relation to the keeping of a register of members, as long as the relevant rules of the relevant market are complied with. Cap. 149. 22(I) of 1995. (2) In the cases referred to in subsection (1) above, the provisions of the Contract Law for the pledge of share certificates shall not apply, but, in relation to the pledge of such shares, the rules of the relevant market will apply. Annual Return Annual return to be made by company having a share capital. Sixth Schedule.
